item.title: How to use Json Schema
item.description: Provide compliance data using Json Schema What is JSON Schema? JSON Schema is a powerful tool for validating the structure and content of JSON data. It defines the expected format of JSON documents, providing a clear, structured way to ensure that data adheres to a defined set of rules. Why Use JSON Schema? Validation: JSON Schema helps validate that the JSON data meets a predefined format, ensuring data integrity and reducing errors.
